name: cricket live T20 Pro
description:
World's most realistic mobile cricket game. Features best-in-class physics and 3D graphics.

Tired of all those cricket games with poor controls and fake bat-ball collision and physics?
End your search. DOWNLOAD CRICKET LIVE T20 NOW!

Are you a cricket fan? and you love batting? Keep smashing the ball without getting out. See how far you can go in the high-score mode.
If you would like some bowling action, play the QuickMatch or Tournament modes.
